demographics.diagnosis: Adult Failure to Thrive; COPD; CHF; Cellulitis; Diabetes

clinical_logic.readiness_milestone: Wound trajectory improvement and therapy endurance (1hr/day, 6 days/week)
clinical_barriers: Multiple wounds: sacrum, left leg, right leg, right groin, right heel

environmental_logic.physical_barriers: Patient required two-person manual assist or mechanical lift for home safety
environmental_logic.modification_type: DME (Hoyer Lift, Slide Board, Transfer Bench)
bureaucratic_steps: Wound care dressing training for son
Coordination with SW for DME ordering

timeline_deltas.context: Initial discharge delayed because patient was not strong enough for husband and son to lift safely; needed intensive PT/OT to reach 'more ambulatory' status.
Acute respiratory failure on 9/24/25 led to hospital transfer, terminating the SNF-to-home discharge track.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Family report of empty O2 tanks and patient 'sitting too much' causing wounds.
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Escalated concerns to Facility Social Worker; verified facility protocol.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Facility awareness increased, though staff claimed compliance; friction remained with family.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Patient required 2-person assist; family aging/physical limitations.
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Proposed Hoyer Lift and slide board for home use.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Equipment discussed to shorten SNF stay, but limited by patient's own strength needed to use the lift.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Patient transferred to non-affiliated facility after hospitalization.
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Maintained contact with son twice post-discharge to build relationship.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Family appreciated support but declined return due to dissatisfaction with original SNF; case closed due to lack of contract.

rank_1_best_practices.action: Follow-up calls to the son to check on status and offer future help.
rank_1_best_practices.rationale: Maintains the relationship for potential re-entry or future service needs even if current facility is out-of-network.

rank_0_boundary_failures.action: Failure to verify 'Daily Weights' at the facility level.
rank_0_boundary_failures.rationale: Clinical indicators (fluid) were present but PN did not formally audit the facility's monitoring prior to the respiratory failure event.

rank_0_boundary_failures.action: Did not attempt to negotiate a Single Case Agreement (SCA).
rank_0_boundary_failures.rationale: The PN assumed that no contract meant the patient could not be followed, missing an opportunity for operational advocacy.

unscripted_chaos_signals: Rural Geography: PN traveling up to 3 hours for site visits
Staffing Volatility: Loss of PN coverage in Buffalo/Syracuse regions during case
Family Distrust: Son adamant about not returning to 'the sniff' due to perceived neglect
